title: Monitor Resolution Input Error Please help
body: Hi, I just started playing LoL again recently and tried multipule times to enter games but every time I launch it my computer's screen goes black and says the resolution is too big for the screen and that it's "out of range". I have no idea how to fix this and really need some help.

replies.body: Alt+Enter does not toggle fullscreen for me for some reason. I'm just not going to play and wait until you can fix the problem. How can I know when the problem has been fixed?

Try another workaround that may help in this case:

Log in to League of Legends
Browse to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config and open "Game.cfg" in notepad or any other text editor
Find this line: WindowMode=X
Change the "X" to 2. IE: WindowMode=2
Save this, then launch a custom game

I don't have additional information or ETAs on the situation, so I recommend bookmarking our status page for updates on a fix.  Let me know if that clears things up!

I actually found that recommendation from another community member and it works. I guess it must be the fullscreen mode not adjusting to the monitor of the player and going to the max size?

Too bad I've tried entering too many games and can't play for 20 more minuites because apparently I'm a leaver...

This is a live issue that's currently being updated on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  I don't have an eta on a fix, but the current workaround is to tap Alt+Enter to toggle fullscreen and restore the game.  That should get you fixed up until a more permanent resolution is made.
